ValidationRule.description: APR0153141 Agency - Flock EDI Case for improved tracking
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), ($RecordType.Name = 'Flock Cases'), ISPICKVAL(BeneTrac_Category_1__c, "Renewal"), IF(ISPICKVAL(Team__c,"EDI"),OR( ISBLANK(OE_start_date__c),ISBLANK(OE_end_date__c)), false) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You Must enter the OE start Date and end date if you select the Team as EDI
